channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 06/13/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Supports LINE card messages and button messages, enriching your conversations. Enhanced User Experience: Improved behavior of adding buttons to lists. Message Response Support: Supports URL and Markdown formats. 06/06/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Interface Adjustment: Added design styles to AI Agent information, allowing you to better design the dialogue interface. New WordPress Integration: You can now deploy your AI Agent on WordPress.
